SELECT QPAR.PLNT_CD , QPAR.REQ_IDX , QPAR.ISP_REQ_NO , QPAR.ISP_REQ_DT , QPAR.ETR_QTY , QPAR.INP_UNIT , QPAR.BATCH_NO , QPAR.LOT_NO , QPAR.PHS_ORDER_NO , QPAR.PDT_ORDER_NO , QPAR.SPL_CD , QPAR.SPL_NM , QPAR.PHS_CRG_NM , QPAR.MAK_DT , QPAR.WRK_NM , QPAR.MAK_EQP , QPAR.USE_LMT , QPAR.STRG_LMT , QPAR.ADD_COL1 , DECODE(QPAR.ADD_COL1, 'A', '시험(구매)', 'B', '시험(생산)', '시험(수동)') AS ADD_COL1_NM , QPAP.ANS_IDX , QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX , QPAP.ANS_NO , QPAP.ASS_NO , QPAP.ANS_TYP , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPAP.ANS_TYP) AS ANS_TYP_NM , QPAP.SYT_JDG , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = QPAP.SYT_JDG) AS SYT_JDG_NM , QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD) AS ANS_PROC_NM , QPAP.REQ_DS , QPAP.RCP_DS , (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER SU WHERE SU.USER_ID = QPAP.RCP_UID AND SU.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD) AS RCP_UNM , QPAP.ASS_DT , (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER APR WHERE APR.PLNT_CD = QPAR.PLNT_CD AND APR.USER_ID = SAI.APR_UID) AS ASS_UNM , QPAP.REVW_DS , (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER SU WHERE SU.USER_ID = QPAP.REVW_UID AND SU.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD) AS REVW_UNM , APPR.APR_DS AS RST_APR_DS , (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER APR WHERE APR.PLNT_CD = QPAR.PLNT_CD AND APR.USER_ID = APPR.APR_UID) AS RST_APR_UNM , QPAP.RCP_RMK , QPAP.CLLT_RMK , QPAP.REVW_CMMT , QPAP.ASS_SPCC , QPAI.PITM_SPCC , QPAI.NON_CFM_REA FROM QT_PITM_ANS_REQ QPAR LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP ON QPAR.REQ_IDX = QPAP.REQ_IDX AND QPAR.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_INFO QPAI ON QPAP.ANS_IDX = QPAI.ANS_IDX AND QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPAI.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC QPS ON QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX = QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX AND QPAR.MTR_CD = QPS.PITM_CD AND QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QPS.PITM_CD = QP.PITM_CD AND QPS.PITM_VER = QP.PITM_VER AND QPS.PLNT_CD = QP.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON QP.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER AND QP.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO_SAP QPIS ON QP.PITM_CD = QPIS.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPIS.PITM_VER AND QP.PLNT_CD = QPIS.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN SY_APR_INFO SAI ON SAI.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD AND SAI.APR_IDX = QPAP.ASS_APR_REQ_IDX LEFT JOIN SY_APR_INFO APPR ON APPR.PLNT_CD = QPAP.PLNT_CD AND APPR.APR_IDX = QPAP.RST_APR_REQ_IDX WHERE QPAR.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD = #{ansProcCd} AND QPAP.HLD_YN = 'N' AND QPAP.ANS_TYP IN ('S0230001','S0230002','S0230003')
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPAR.ISP_REQ_NO)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{ispReqNo})) || '%')
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPAR.PHS_ORDER_NO)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{phsOrderNo})) || '%')
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPAR.BATCH_NO)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{batchNo})) || '%')
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPAR.LOT_NO)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{lotNo})) || '%')
AND QPI.PITM_TYP = #{pitmTyp}
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPI.PITM_NM)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{pitmNm})) || '%')
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPI.PITM_CD)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{pitmCd})) || '%')
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPAR.LOT_NO)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{lotNo})) || '%')
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPAR.BATCH_NO)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{batchNo})) || '%')
AND QPAP.ANS_TYP = #{ansTyp}
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPAP.ANS_NO)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{ansNo})) || '%')
AND QPAP.REQ_DT BETWEEN #{searchReqDt[0]} AND #{searchReqDt[1]}
ORDER BY QPAP.ANS_IDX, QPAP.REQ_IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QT_PITM_ANS_RST ( PLNT_CD , ANS_IDX , RST_SEQ , RST_PROC_CD , ANS_DPT_CD , AMITM_CD , AITM_ORD , PERSPEC_TXT , OWC_SPEC_TXT , SPEC_TXT_EN , SPEC_TYP , JDG_TYP , PER_SLV_LOW , PER_SLV_UPP , PER_SLV_DESC , OWC_SLV_LOW , OWC_SLV_UPP , OWC_SLV_DESC , SLV_JDG_CFM , SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , RST_UNIT_CD , RST_DPNT , RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , RPT_PRT_YN , ISP_DPT_CD , SMP_CLLT_QTY , SMP_CLLT_UNIT , ISP_DUR_TM , EQM_USE_TM ) SELECT #{plntCd} , #{ansIdx} , AITM_SEQ , 'S0140100' , ANS_DPT_CD , AMITM_CD , AITM_ORD , PERSPEC_TXT , OWC_SPEC_TXT , SPEC_TXT_EN , SPEC_TYP , JDG_TYP , PER_SLV_LOW , PER_SLV_UPP , PER_SLV_DESC , OWC_SLV_LOW , OWC_SLV_UPP , OWC_SLV_DESC , SLV_JDG_CFM , SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , RST_UNIT_CD , RST_DPNT , RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , RPT_PRT_YN , ISP_DPT_CD , SMP_CLLT_QTY , SMP_CLLT_UNIT , ISP_DUR_TM , EQM_USE_TM FROM QM_PITM_SPEC_AITM WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND AITM_SPEC_IDX = #{aitmSpecIdx}
